results.content: Thanks to Thomas Grant for helping me and many others learn how to gain advantage on free blogger pages. He gives you step-by-step with clear instructions. Best of all, you can learn at your own pace, because everything is categorized and flexible for your needs. When you are done with your lesson for the day, your progress on which lessons you left off is automatically saved so you can get back. Right now there is a promotion going with a lower price, but be sure to get it while you still can, the promotion ends at the end of June. There is more than enough lessons and it should be worth way more than Thomas Grant is providing to all his members. Thank you Thomas for making it easy to learn how to make free blogs.
